subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Nikolai Valuev of Russia won the World Boxing Association heavyweight championship, outpointing John Ruiz of the United States in a unanimous decision in Berlin. Valuev (49-1) regained the title he lost last year to Ruslan Chagaev. The fight was first declared a split decision, but after the decision was read out, one of the judges alerted the W.B.A. delegate that he had also given the fight to Valuev.
